name: Cristalia Time
description:
A large cave known only as Cristalia is Violet's biggest nightmare. The cave full of monsters has a magic linked to its time crystals, from the moment you enter it, a loop begins, and it is only possible to get out of it loop the moment you reach the end. Violet pretends to believe that James is waiting for her at the end, but deep down she knows he might be a dead body on this path of no return, or rather, on this looped path!

 Collect crystals, destroy monsters and try to get where no one else has gone before, this is Cristalia Time!
